!hey !Build Statushttps://travis-ci.org/rakyll/hey hey is a tiny program that sends some load to a web application. hey was originally called boom and was influenced from Tarek Ziade's tool at tarekziade/boom. Using the same name was a mistake as it resulted in cases where binary name conflicts created confusion. To preserve the name for its original owner, we renamed this project to hey. Installation Linux 64-bit: https://hey-release.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/heylinuxamd64 Mac 64-bit: https://hey-release.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/heydarwinamd64 Windows 64-bit: https://hey-release.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/heywindowsamd64 Package Managers macOS: - Homebrew users can use . Usage hey runs provided number of requests in the provided concurrency level and prints stats. It also supports HTTP2 endpoints. Previously known as github.com/rakyll/boom.
